text:
This is a story about a little person who knew everything—
A story from a different loop long before the Christmas at the amusement park.

Finale:
The Two Spirits of Snow

name: Korpokkur
text:
Which loop was it that I met Snegurochka for the first time?
I think it was when she was a topic of conversation at Ojibo Academy.

name: Male Student
text:
Snegurochka-chan!
See you tomorrow, bye-bye!

name: Snegurochka
text:
Yes, see you tomorrow!
I look forward to working with you again tomorrow!

Korpokkur found Snegurochka,
who had just come out of the school gate.

name: Korpokkur
text:
Ah, there you are.
You're Snegurochka, right?

name: Snegurochka
text:
Yes, that's right.
And you are...?

name: Korpokkur
text:
Sorry for calling out to you so suddenly.
I'm Korpokkur. I came from Ojibo Academy.

name: Korpokkur
text:
Actually, the children at my school love you...
So would you mind coming to our school?

name: Snegurochka
text:
Understood!
When should I come?

name: Korpokkur
text:
...Aren't you accepting a little too easy?
You're so compliant, I'm the one who's getting worried.

name: Korpokkur
text:
Shouldn't you be concerned about the money or the conditions?
I might look like this, but I can be quite flexible.

name: Snegurochka
text:
No, I, Magical Girl Snegurochka will gladly go
for everyone's smiles!

name: Korpokkur
text:
-Yes, this was our first meeting.
I thought she was a good kid.

name: Korpokkur
text:
Here, this is my recommended ice cream.
Thank you for today.

name: Snegurochka
text:
Wow! Thank you very much.
Korpokkur-san, you're so kind!

name: Korpokkur
text:
It's nothing. I'm only kind to children.
My dream is to create a paradise for children.

name: Snegurochka
text:
That's a wonderful dream. I'm also in the video productions,
because I want to make children smile as a Santa.

name: Snegurochka
text:
That's right, since it's a 'bond',
please let me help you.
Korpokkur's eyes widened in surprise at the unexpected suggestion.

name: Korpokkur
text:
You... helping me?
You're a child, too, right? What can you do?

name: Snegurochka
text:
I may look like this, but I'm helping the Santas.
Besides, I'm surprisingly well-known in various industries, you know?

name: Korpokkur
text:
Hmm, alright, I'll take you up on your offer.
I'm having a hard time creating a paradise for children myself.

name: Snegurochka
text:
Hmm, let's see.
How about making an amusement park?

name: Snegurochka
text:
We'll create a place where children can forget about time,
a place where they can forget about their troubles and smile.

name: Korpokkur
text:
...That's a really good idea!!
I'll try building the 'base' I'm making in that direction.

name: Korpokkur
text:
And so, the amusement park that
Snegurochka and I made began.

name: Korpokkur
text:
Thank you, Snegurochka.
Thanks to you, I've taken a step closer to my dream.

name: Korpokkur
text:
And if you're okay with it, would you mind
becoming the image character for this amusement park?

name: Korpokkur
text:
I'll handle the negotiations with the other parties.
I may be short, but my network is pretty big, yes?

name: Snegurochka
text:
Can I...?
By all means, I'd be very happy to help!

name: Korpokkur
text:
Hehe, then let's name
this amusement park 'Magical Snowland'.

name: Korpokkur
text:
Everything was going well at this time.
But I also have to talk about Jack—

Snegurochka knocked on the
principal's office door and entered.

name: Snegurochka
text:
Grandpa, what's wrong?
Did you need me for something...?

name: Ded
text:
Snegurochka, I have something I'd like to ask of you.
This is Jack Frost, a transfer student to our school.

name: Ded
text:
I'd like you to show him around the school.
Can you do me this favor?

name: Snegurochka
text:
Of course!
It's a pleasure to meet you, um, Jack-san!

name: Jack Frost
text:
Is it really okay to leave me with this kid?
I'd prefer someone more reliable.

name: Snegurochka
text:
Hold on, aren't you being too rude!?
I may look like this, but I'm an excellent Santa, you know?

name: Ded
text:
Hahaha, I think you two
will get along well.

name: Korpokkur
text:
Snegurochka told me that story.
The two of them hit it off right away in every loop.

name: Korpokkur
text:
And that became the catalyst for
that horrible thing to happen.

name: Snegurochka
text:
Brother Jack isn't here again today?
What is he doing, wandering around somewhere...

Even after asking his classmates, no one knows
why he is absent, or where he might be.

name: Snegurochka
text:
...Brother is a fool.
He promised to go to the amusement park with me.

name: Snegurochka
text:
I even asked Grandpa, but he said he
was sworn to secrecy and wouldn't tell me anything...

Snegurochka wandered all over Tokyo until late at night when everyone was asleep.
She found the person she was looking for in front of a large concrete wall.

Jack Frost stood there, his face serious,
holding a spray can, facing his work.

name: Snegurochka
text:
Brother, I finally found you.
What are you doing here so late at night?

name: Jack Frost
text:
Whoaaaaaaaah!
You ruined it, you bastard!

name: Jack Frost
text:
...Wait, Snegurochka!?
You, what are you doing here at this time?

name: Snegurochka
text:
That's my line!
You're being a delinquent, Brother!!

name: Jack Frost
text:
Shut up, where did you learn that word?
I was just doing some graffiti...

name: Snegurochka
text:
Hey, Brother.
Is it true that you haven't been feeling well lately?

At Snegurochka's words, Jack's hand,
which was holding the spray can, stopped.

name: Snegurochka
text:
You haven't been to school lately, so
we've been worried... Are you sick?

name: Jack Frost
text:
Shut up, don't worry about me.
It's none of your business.

Snegurochka kept trying to get him to talk,
but Jack kept pushing her away.

name: Snegurochka
text:
...W-What. I was worried about you.
Fine, I don't care about you anymore!

Watching Snegurochka run away,
Jack sighed and turned back to the wall.

Snegurochka visited Jack,
who was listlessly looking out the window.

name: Snegurochka
text:
Brother Jack...
I came to visit you?

name: Jack Frost
text:
Snegurochka...
I told you not to come here.

name: Snegurochka
text:
I couldn't just stay away.
You told me you were hospitalized, after all.

name: Snegurochka
text:
You said you gave up, right? Hehe, I win.
I brought an apple, I'll peel it for you.

Without waiting for Jack to stop her,
Snegurochka took out a fruit knife and began peeling an apple.

name: Snegurochka
text:
Look, a bunny!
Hehe, I practiced myself.

name: Jack Frost
text:
...You're so bad at it.
What part of that looks like a bunny? It doesn't even look like a living creature.

name: Snegurochka
text:
Geez, Brother, you may be good at drawing, but
I tried my best, you know!

name: Jack Frost
text:
...Thank you, Snegurochka.
For someone like me.

Snegurochka, who was pouting,
stopped her hand at Jack's weakened words.

name: Snegurochka
text:
Please, Brother Jack.
Tell me, what's happening to you?

name: Jack Frost
text:
...You really don't have to worry about me.
I'm going to disappear in the spring anyway.

name: Snegurochka
text:
W-What do you mean?
Brother Jack, you're going to disappear...?

The disliked fairy, Jack Frost, who was believed to be
the cause of the harsh cold of winter in the otherworld Tir na nOg—

An existence fated to disappear,
because of the wish for winter to pass and spring to come.

name: Snegurochka
text:
Is that the same as me—
No, Brother, is there no way for you to be saved?
Can no one do something about it?

name: Jack Frost
text:
I'd like to know that myself.
But so far, I haven't found a way.

name: Jack Frost
text:
...I don't want to disappear either!
But, I don't know what to do...

Snegurochka was speechless at Jack's confession.
She could hear the sound of him sniffling.

The banter they used to share was gone,
and Snegurochka was silent in front of the listless Jack.

name: Jack Frost
text:
I wanted to leave a legacy of my existence, so as you saw that night,
I'm leaving my mark on this city.

name: Jack Frost
text:
Even if I disappear, my art will remain in this world.
Even if someone erases it, it will remain in their memory, right?

name: Jack Frost
text:
That's all I can do with the time I have left.
I can even grant your requests now-

Snegurochka started to cry at
the sight of the weakened Jack.

name: Snegurochka
text:
Don't say that...
I want to do many things with you, Brother.

name: Snegurochka
text:
I will find a way for you to be saved,
so please, believe in me and wait.

However, she couldn't find any clues.
And that was to be expected, as Jack himself had already given up.

But Snegurochka didn't give up.
She finally found one person.

name: Onyankopon
text:
Welcome. Now, what do you seek here—
I'll gladly hear you out?

name: Snegurochka
text:
Brother!
I found it, the way to save you!

name: Jack Frost
text:
S-Snegurochka.
Is it really...?

name: Snegurochka
text:
Yes!
Hehe, I told you to believe in me and wait, didn't I?

At Snegurochka's words,
Jack bowed his head and shed tears.

name: Jack Frost
text:
Snegurochka, thank you...
Thank you very much...

And just like that, the preparations progressed quickly,
and on the night before the surgery—

name: Jack Frost
text:
Snegurochka, after the surgery is successful,
let's go to the amusement park together.

name: Snegurochka
text:
...Yes, I'm looking forward to it.
It'll be alright, I'm sure it'll go well.

name: Jack Frost
text:
When spring comes, I'd like to go see some cherry blossoms.
We'll ask Ded-sensei, and... if you make some friends, how about we all go together?

Jack's chest swelled with anticipation for the season he had never got to experience,
while Snegurochka's hands were trembling in contrast.

name: Jack Frost
text:
What, don't worry about me.
You've picked up this life for me, so don't feel guilty if it fails.

name: Onyankopon
text:
...How is your body feeling?
I'd like you to tell me if you feel anything strange.

name: Jack Frost
text:
Ah, no, nothing in particular...
Is it over now?

name: Onyankopon
text:
It's a good thing that you're fine.
The surgery was successful, congratulations.

To Jack, it felt like no time had
passed since he closed his eyes.

Jack moved his body to check for any abnormalities,
and noticed the cold air emanating from himself.

He knew where that familiar cold came from.
He understood whose it was.

name: Jack Frost
text:
Hey, why is the snow from
her covering my body...?

name: Onyankopon
text:
That's a side effect of the surgery.
From now on, you'll have to live with that cold-

name: Jack Frost
text:
That's not what I'm asking!
I'm asking why her cold is coming from my body!

name: Onyankopon
text:
Haven't you heard?
I see, she kept it a secret from you...

name: Onyankopon
text:
Through my 'life recombination',
Snegurochka's snow Sacred Artifact is now dwelling inside your body.

name: Jack Frost
text:
Hey, Snegurochka is alright, isn't she?
If she's around here, you can tell me where she is!

Onyankopon didn't answer, only to wear a solemn expression.
It was something Jack had already suspected.

name: Jack Frost
text:
Then, what was the point of my promise,
to welcome spring with her...?

name: Korpokkur
text:
You... what the hell did you do to Snegurochka!?
Why is her snowy glaze all over your body!?

Jack simply endured Korpokkur's
attacks without resistance.

name: Korpokkur
text:
No, damn it, damn it...!
Why are you, of all people, here instead of Snegurochka!?

name: Jack Frost
text:
I'm sorry, you're right.
She was always better than someone like me...!

Korpokkur looked at Jack,
and showed a pained expression.

He threw a white envelope at Jack,
who was slumped over and unmoving.

Inside the envelope was a letter
in Snegurochka's own handwriting, addressed to 'Brother Jack'.

name: Snegurochka
text:
To my beloved Brother, first of all, I'm sorry.
I had to keep it a secret, because you wouldn't get the surgery had I told you the truth.

name: Snegurochka
text:
Please, don't worry about it.
My life, it was never meant to last beyond winter anyway—

name: Snegurochka
text:
...I'm sorry I couldn't keep my promise
to go to the amusement park together.

name: Snegurochka
text:
Please, forget about me and live happily.
That is, my final request of you.

Jack, having finished reading, bursted into tears.
Snegurochka's handwriting blurred as it was soaked with his tears.

And from inside the envelope,
another letter fell out, addressed to Korpokkur.

Korpokkur snatched it from Jack's hands,
and began to read through it like he was devouring it whole.

name: Snegurochka
text:
To my dearest Korpokkur-san. I'm sorry for always doing as I pleased,
even though you were always so considerate of me.

name: Snegurochka
text:
It's my biggest regret that I wasn't
able to help you with your dream to the end.

name: Snegurochka
text:
It too became my dream at some point.
I'm truly sorry that I had to leave it unfinished.

name: Snegurochka
text:
Right! I think Brother Jack would be
a surprisingly good mascot for the amusement park.

name: Snegurochka
text:
I'm sure he'll be depressed because I'm gone,
so please watch over him and support him. Please.

name: Ded
text:
...Jack Frost,
are you really leaving?

name: Jack Frost
text:
If you want to be meddlesome, you can just keep a spot for me.
But, without Snegurochka, I no longer have any reason to stay here.

name: Ded
text:
I see. I'm not too worried about you,
but please... Take care of yourself.

Jack Frost, having left Santa School,
wandered the streets of Tokyo without a destination.

As if to seek the form of the girl who had disappeared,
he eventually arrived in front of a certain amusement park.

name: Korpokkur
text:
You left Santa School, huh?
What did the principal say?

name: Jack Frost
text:
...No, nothing at all. I was prepared to
get beaten up, but nothing happened.

name: Jack Frost
text:
I think he knew everything.
Honestly, that man's a saint.

name: Korpokkur
text:
He must have understood you and Snegurochka,
and how this all unfolded.

name: Korpokkur
text:
Hey, you like children, don't you? You were a part
of Santa School... So you are at least that way, right?

Saying that,
Korpokkur threw an outfit at Jack Frost.

name: Jack Frost
text:
...What is this outfit?
Are you telling me to work at this amusement park?

name: Korpokkur
text:
This is the costume for the mascot character
of the amusement park that Snegurochka and I made.

name: Korpokkur
text:
...In her letter, she wrote that her biggest regret
was not being able to help me with my dream.

name: Korpokkur
text:
If you're up for it, then take her place,
and live for the children as 'Frosty'.

name: Korpokkur
text:
I don't like the idea, but...
If you decide to do it now, for Snegurochka's sake, I'll accept it.

Jack Frost, holding the ice-colored costume,
fell silent for a while, as if to mourn of someone—
Then, he put it on.

name: Korpokkur
text:
Listen, from today onwards, you're 'Frosty,'
the popular mascot of Magical Snowland.

name: Korpokkur
text:
Even if you lose what she gave you one day,
even if all your memories are washed away—

name: Korpokkur
text:
I'll make sure you remember your role.
Don't worry.

name: Korpokkur
text:
For her sake, let's make the children's paradise...
Magical Snowland, lively again.

name: Korpokkur
text:
Well, first, let's practice smiling.
You can't be in public with that grumpy face.

name: Korpokkur
text:
That is roughly how it all happened.
A part of a loop where Snegurochka could not be saved.

name: Hastur
text:
...I understand, Korpokkur.
But why didn't you ask for us sooner?

name: Korpokkur
text:
There were several adult-like circumstances.
...I just don't know what to say, it makes me want to cry.
Korpokkur said, avoiding everyone's gaze.

name: Tianzun
text:
Hmm... my student, [Player].
Do you know what to do at a time like this?

options.text: 'There is always only a single path'!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Tianzun
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Hahahaha, that's right!
You remembered well, my good student.

name: Tianzun
text:
The logic of Kamuy Kotan alone,
and the logic of Kitezh alone, cannot solve this situation.

name: Tianzun
text:
In times like these...
You just have to connect everything together.

name: Tianzun
text:
There are more than 23 worlds...
You should know that by now.

options.text: Don't tell me, the faith of--
I don't get it... Yoshito, help me out here!?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yoshito
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Please don't worry, Master.
I will get my hands dirty with you in this world.

text: And then, everyone's gaze gathered on Korpokkur.

name: Korpokkur
text:
...Alright, alright! I get it!
With Tokyo's influence, it falls under the jurisdiction of the 'World Representative'.

name: Korpokkur
text:
I'll take care of the sponsors.
Just like how I did with Snowland.

name: Everyone
text: --OK!

The location on the screen was the Tokyo Santa School.
However, something was different from the place everyone knew—

name: Snegurochka
text:
Ah, Brother Jack, you are on camera!
Come on now, don't be shy, come over here!

name: Jack Frost
text:
…I don't need to be there.
You're the one who wanted to start filming, aren't you?

name: Jack Frost
text:
Besides, I'm so big that I can't even
fit in the same frame as you, you know?

name: Snegurochka
text:
Geez, why are you always so mean?!
Just come over here, I want to be in the picture with you!

name: Snegurochka
text:
Come on, if you keep being lazy,
you'll end up looking like that snowman!

name: Jack Frost
text:
Oi! Don't pull me!
…Geez, is this good enough?

name: Snegurochka
text:
Ehehe, alright, here we go!
[Player]-san, everyone... can you see us?

name: Snegurochka
text:
I'm Snegurochka!
...Well, I think you already know that.

name: Jack Frost
text:
I'm Jack Frost.
…Geez, why do I have to do this?

After introducing themselves to the camera,
the two began to talk about why they were filming a video message.

name: Snegurochka
text:
I asked Brother to film this video with me
for the second season's behind-the-scenes and promotions.

name: Snegurochka
text:
By the way— Did you think this Santa School was real?
Actually, it's a video projected onto a big screen in the studio!

name: Snegurochka
text:
And look at this place too! I've only ever done location
filming before, so this way of filming is a fresh and exciting experience!

name: Snegurochka
text:
Korpokkur-san made this studio on
the grounds of Magical Snowland for me.

name: Snegurochka
text:
Since Brother and I can't leave here for a while,
the studio was made so we can continue filming.

name: Jack Frost
text:
The scenes with everyone were filmed on location during the winter,
and our scenes are being filmed separately later...
I see, so that's how video production works.

name: Jack Frost
text:
—But, is this really for promotion purposes?
This just seems like a private conversation between is.

name: Snegurochka
text:
Wow! You're surprisingly enthusiastic, Brother Jack!
You said you'd do anything for me, didn't you?

Jack's face twitched at the bad feeling Snegurochka's smile gave him—
And then, the scene went black.

name: Jack Frost & Snegurochka
text: Magical Girl ☆ Snegurochka, Season 2!

With their shout, an unfamiliar opening
song for 'Magical Girl ☆ Snegurochka' began to play—
In the video, Jack Frost and Snegurochka danced happily to the music.

[Player] and the others watched the promotional video for the new season,
which was filmed in a studio somewhere, in the Santa School classroom.

name: Jack Frost
text:
Why am I putting myself through this...?
This is definitely going down in history as a smudge I'll never get rid of.

name: Snegurochka
text:
A 'dance video' is a classic for short promotional videos, right?
And, it'll be useful for you as Frosty in the future!

name: Snegurochka
text:
Dancing with children, or dancing at Santa School,
don't you think those'd be hot topics?

name: Jack Frost
text:
I don't want to be popular!
Ugh, I'm so embarrassed I could die...

After the video ended, [Player] and the others
talked to the two in the studio via a video call.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jack Frost
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Shut up, stop making fun of me!
Why, why did I agree to this...

options.text: That was a really great video.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yoshito
dialogue_after_selection.text:
A dance video... Moritaka...
I have an idea!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Tianzun
dialogue_after_selection.text:
I want to film one too!
How about a dance video with a master and disciple?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hastur
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Why with you!?
Hmph, a dance video with the Old Ones would have more impact!

options.text: What about the video with everyone in it!?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Snegurochka
dialogue_after_selection.text:
That's coming next!
The staff had already sent it to you, so please don't worry.

name: Korpokkur
text:
I'm astonished by your carefree attitude.
But well, I feel a sense of relief.

name: Korpokkur
text:
And so, somehow, we managed to make it.
...I can't believe I can't beat a crying child.

options.text: I'm glad I went crazy back then.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Korpokkur
dialogue_after_selection.text:
That's nothing to be happy about!
You threw a tantrum and damaged things, so luckily there was someone who could repair the ice.

options.text: It's all thanks to you, Korpokkur.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Korpokkur
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Don't say such adult pleasantries.
If it weren't for your suggestions...
I would have never done something like this.

options.text: It worked out thanks to everyone's ideas!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Korpokkur
dialogue_after_selection.text: Ah, no, I would have never come up with this idea on my own.

name: Korpokkur
text:
We'll pretend the amusement park buried in
artificial snow is 'closed for new attraction construction'—

name: Korpokkur
text:
We'll adjust the park to the environment of an eternal winter,
and have Jack and Snegurochka live there until the preparations are complete.

name: Korpokkur
text:
This way, unlike a closed area, time won't rewind.
It wouldn't have been possible without the technology of the 'otherworld'.

name: Snegurochka
text:
It's truly amazing! It's as cold as it was on Christmas Day,
even though I can see the sky and feel the sunlight!

name: Snegurochka
text:
And look at these signs all over the park! 'Santas in Preparation'—
Hehe, the departure ceremony was so fun!

name: Snegurochka
text:
We're preparing for the next Christmas with Santa's great principle, 'Idea'!
Grandpa's homework, until it's finished, we're still Santas, aren't we?

name: Snegurochka
text:
And living in an amusement park is like a dream!
Isn't this just a rare experience, right, Brother?

name: Jack Frost
text:
Yeah, it's really amazing. It's too luxurious of a
'life extension' for someone like me that it's a waste.

name: Snegurochka
text:
Geez, Brother Jack, can't you think of anything
better to say!? You should just thank them honestly.

name: Jack Frost
text:
...We haven't seen the results of this, right?
We have done all that we could, though.

Jack's anxiety, conveyed through the video,
reached [Player] and the others.

options.text: It's all up to Tokyo's 'faith' now.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hastur
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Why are you so condescending?
You have me, Hastur, who knows a thing or two about spreading things, to even lend you a hand.

options.text: I'm starting to feel anxious too...

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hastur
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Why are you so condescending?
You have me, Hastur, who knows a thing or two about spreading things, to even lend you a hand.

name: Hastur
text:
I hate to say it, but I also relied on Pazuzu's connections and financial power.
I don't even want to think about what I'll have to do in return.

name: Tianzun
text:
Hastur is right, we've done all we can.
I can't wait for the release!

name: Yoshito
text:
I am powerless compared to everyone, but I think I can say this.
I'm sure we'll achieve a great result that surpasses our imagination...

name: Korpokkur
text:
Hey, Snegurochka. Show us the other videos.
You have the edited data, right?

name: Korpokkur
text:
Rather than our words, seeing the actual
result would be more convincing, right?

name: Snegurochka
text:
Leave it to me! Then, next...
I'll show you the video with everyone in it, okay?

Snegurochka operated her device and
switched the screen to play the video.

What was shown was the story of welcoming
the 'next season' that began on that day—

name: Tianzun
text:
The new season needs a new villain!
Leave it to this slightly evil old man.

name: Hastur
text:
I'm the cool senior in this new world...
Hmph, I can do it without your help!

name: Yoshito
text:
And I'm the classmate. Sometimes an enemy,
sometimes an ally... Yes, I can do that.

name: Korpokkur
text:
I'm the final boss?
Alright, alright, I'll take responsibility for it.

name: Jack Frost
text:
And I'm the new mascot, huh...
I know, it wouldn't work without me, right?

This was [Player]'s plan.
First, to create excitement for 'Season 2' throughout Tokyo.

They would air a promotional video during the winter, to make more than
half of Tokyo's population believe that 'Snegurochka will continue'.

And they would heavily promote Snowland,
raising the public's awareness of the mascot 'Frosty'.

They would also make 'Magical Girl ☆ Snegurochka On Stage'
a permanent event at the park.

The plan was to spread the idea that you can
'meet the two of them anytime at the amusement park'.

name: Snegurochka
text:
Yes, [Player]-san!
Alright everyone, let's say it together?

name: Snegurochka
text:
Kira-kira Pappah! Piraporepah!!
Magical Girl Snegurochka, making a comeback for your dream!
Battle Start

name: Jack Frost
text:
Ahhhhhhhhhhh!
Enough of this, why did I have to dance so much!?

Jack Frost, embarrassed by his cheerful dancing with Snegurochka
in the promotional video, cried out in shame, burying his face in his hands.

name: Korpokkur
text:
It's the rule for these kinds of videos, so it can't be helped.
You might as well give up on your cool persona.

name: Hastur
text:
...Korpokkur. I have a question for you.
Why did you decide to cooperate with us in the end?

name: Hastur
text:
In the past loops, you knew of everything,
but you never told us anything.

At Hastur's question,
everyone's gaze turned to Korpokkur.

name: Korpokkur
text:
Because I tried everything and it didn't work.
So I gave up, that's all.

name: Tianzun
text:
Hehe, everything is finally coming together.
But, knowing you, you must have a backup plan, right?

name: Korpokkur
text:
...This is why I hate adults.
Yes, I have a backup plan, of course.

name: Korpokkur
text:
If push comes to shove, I might be able to use
Jack and Snegurochka as cores to create an otherworld.

name: Korpokkur
text:
By transplanting 'memories,'
I might be able to make them function properly— Something like that.

name: Jack Frost
text:
I don't really mind...
If it means that I could be alone by myself.

name: Korpokkur
text:
I'm done having to listen to you say that anymore.
Do you know how hard I had to work for this?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Tianzun
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Hehehe... it's alright, Jack.
When you're feeling lonely, just come and jump into my arms!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jack Frost
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Why would I do that, old man?
And do I have to mention that we're on a video call!?
Geez, you teachers are way too meddlesome.

options.text: Are you going to wail again?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jack Frost
dialogue_after_selection.text:
H-Hey... you better be joking, [Player]?
If I were to hit by that sentence 2 times, I'd be really put off, alright?

name: Jack Frost
text:
...Sorry for being so wishy-washy.
I want to have hope too.

name: Jack Frost
text:
I joined this plan to welcome
spring with you all and Snegurochka.

options.text: Being covered in sweat and mud was worth it.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jack Frost
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...That's a direct confession, isn't it?
But, alright, believe in me and wait.

name: Hastur
text:
But the setting for the new season is Santa School...
I can no longer tell which is reality.

name: Yoshito
text:
We are also Santa School students.
We're going to the same school as Master... Hehe...

name: Tianzun
text:
I'm also appearing as a teacher!
Ded-sensei was very enthusiastic too, you know?

name: Snegurochka
text:
Alright, next, it's finally time to play
the first episode's scene...!
Saying so, Snegurochka played the video again—

Season 2, Episode 1.
The stage is Tokyo Santa School, where Snegurochka has just transferred.

At a time when the world was filled with anticipation for Christmas,
a figure was about to enter the Santa School gate.

name: Snegurochka
text:
This... is Grandpa's Santa School.
I'm so nervous, I wonder if I can even make friends?

name: Jack Frost
text:
You're the new transfer student, right?
If you'd like, I can show you around.

name: Snegurochka
text:
...! Yes, please, if you could!
Um, may I have your name...?

name: Jack Frost
text:
I'm Jack—
Jack Frost.

name: Snegurochka
text:
It's a pleasure to meet you!
Brother Jack!

name: Ded
text:
Oh, you've already become friends?
Welcome, Snegurochka.

In the video of the upcoming second season,
Ded and Snegurochka were smiling, just as in reality.

name: Snegurochka
text:
It's been a while, Grandpa!
I was just talking to someone who called out to me at the school gate.

name: Ded
text:
If that's the case, then I'm glad.
Thank you, Jack, for bringing her here.

name: Ded
text:
And while we're at it, Jack,
would you mind showing her around the school?

name: Ded
text:
This year, there are special transfer students from various schools,
so there aren't many students I can ask.

name: Jack Frost
text:
Alright, Principal.
Have you decided on her class yet? If not—

name: Snegurochka
text:
Yes! I want to be in the same class as Brother!
Is that alright, Grandpa?

name: Ded
text:
...Yes, that's fine too.
I was just thinking that myself.

After a brief conversation, Jack and Snegurochka
left the principal's office, and Ded smiled happily.

name: Ded
text:
You've become brighter, Jack.
Haha, I'm glad I invited you to this school.

Jack then gave Snegurochka a tour of the school
and finally led her to their classroom.

name: Jack Frost
text:
And this is my class.
From today, it's your class too.

name: Jack Frost
text:
Someone might know you from somewhere,
and that might surprise you, but it's not a bad thing.

Snegurochka, with a mix of anticipation
and anxiety, opened the classroom door—

name: Tianzun
text:
Oh, you're finally here.
I was waiting for you, Jack.

name: Jack Frost
text:
Hah!?
What are you guys doing here!?

name: Korpokkur
text:
Surprised, are you?
It was a lot of trouble to put pressure on the school.

name: Hastur
text:
Hmph, we've already won over your classmates.
Our secret transfer plan for you seems to have been a success.

name: Male Student
text:
Ah, so these were your friends, Jack-kun?
They do seem like interesting people?

name: Jack Frost
text:
Well... yes, they're my friends.
They're such a weird bunch, I'd never thought they'd actually transfer here...

name: Jack Frost
text:
But you, you have a lot of authority for a classmate...
And, aren't you a teacher from another academy?

name: Tianzun
text:
This is Santa's Academy, yes?
I may be a teacher in one path, but I'm still a novice in another.

name: Snegurochka
text:
...Umm, it's nice to meet you!
My name is Snegurochka.

name: Snegurochka
text:
I also just transferred today,
and Brother Jack showed me around!

name: Yoshito
text:
Then we're in the same boat.
It's a pleasure to meet you, Snegurochka.

options.text: If you'd like, I hope we can be friends.

name: Snegurochka
text:
Is that alright?
I'd be happy to, please!

And so, the story of Magical Girl Snegurochka meeting new
characters and a new mascot and deepening her bonds began.

But that wasn't all they had to do.
They were preparing for the future that was to come.

Everyone prepared what they could,
and finally, the day arrived—

Spring came, and [Player] and the others
visited the renovated Magical Snowland.

They blindfolded Snegurochka and Jack and led
them to a newly built attraction in the park.

name: Snegurochka
text:
Hey, [Player]-san.
Is it still not time to open my eyes?

What spread out before their eyes
was an undeniable 'spring landscape'.

The space was created by experts in 'natural environments'
and engineers who could virtually reproduce them.

name: Snegurochka
text:
Amazing— Is this spring?
The smell, the atmosphere, everything is different from that of winter—

A perfect spring was reproduced in that miniature garden,
with the exception of the temperature.

name: Tianzun
text:
Hey, Snegurochka.
Hurry up and come over here, or all the bento will be gone!

Amidst the falling cherry blossom petals, Tianzun and the
others were waving at them, sitting on a picnic blanket.

name: Snegurochka
text:
Is this a cherry blossom viewing party...?
You did all this just for us?

options.text: The cherry blossom viewing party begins—!

name: Snegurochka
text:
Thank you so much...
Ehehe, everyone, let me come along too!

name: Hastur
text:
I had prepared some good bento boxes too!
Snegurochka, what's your favorite food? You can tell us.

Korpokkur was watching the promises that were never kept,
fulfilled here and now after an impossibly long time.

name: Tianzun
text:
You're not satisfied with just this, are you?
This is the most important part, Korpokkur.

name: Korpokkur
text:
I know. We can't have them being satisfied with just this.
We have to make them believe that they can welcome spring again.

name: Yoshito
text:
Well then, to liven up the cherry blossom viewing party, I'll do some entertainment tricks.
I shall start off with this one.

name: Yoshito
text:
It's a performance featuring the toy band of the Eight Dog Warriors.
My father also taught me the song for this occasion, 'Let's Go, Hakkenshi'.

name: Snegurochka
text:
Entertainment!?
All of a sudden... Umm... Maybe I can do something too?

name: Tianzun
text:
Hehe, don't worry about it.
Today, you are the guest of honor.

name: Tianzun
text:
But if you want to do something—
How about dancing to Yoshito's performance?

Hastur, with a meaningful look from Tianzun,
showed an expression that was not entirely displeased.

name: Hastur
text:
Hmph... I don't mind going along with
the entertainment that humans enjoy.

name: Snegurochka
text:
Really? In that case, I want to dance!
Brother Jack, you'll join me, right?

name: Jack Frost
text:
Do I have to!? Well, everyone planned
this event for today, right? I guess it's okay...

[Player] and the others enjoyed looking at the flowers and eating bento.
The party was filled with excitement with everyone's performances.

name: Yoshito
text:
I also prepared some sakura mochi for dessert.
My father made these by hand.

name: Korpokkur
text:
Wow, that's amazing. Come to think of it, the tradition of cherry
blossom viewing is also a part of Land of Wa's culture, right?

name: Hastur
text:
Hmm, this sakura mochi is delicious!
It's a masterpiece that satisfies my palate, Snegurochka, you should try it too!

Snegurochka, encouraged by Hastur,
put the sakura mochi in her mouth and smiled brightly.

name: Snegurochka
text:
Woah, the cherry blossoms really fall
like snow, fluttering down like that.

name: Snegurochka
text:
Everyone, thank you so much for today.
I had so much fun!

name: Snegurochka
text:
I... I'm allowed to welcome spring, right?
I'm allowed to dream about it, right?

name: Korpokkur
text:
Snegurochka. [Player] has already said it.
That they have no intention of giving up on you.

name: Yoshito
text:
No, it's not just Master.
Many more people wish for a future with you all.

name: Korpokkur
text:
Right? I'll show you just how
much Magical Girl Snegurochka is loved.

Yoshito and Korpokkur handed
her a pile of fan letters.

From watching the newly released promotional video for the
second season and the regularly updated promotional videos―

Viewers all over Tokyo, from small children to adult tokusatsu otaku,
were eagerly awaiting the new season's broadcast.

Snegurochka, thank you for
keeping the show going.

The promotional video was very interesting.
Please keep on doing your best from now on.

I want to see the new characters,
like Brother Jack, in action soon.

I will always, always,
cheer for Snegurochka.

name: Snegurochka
text:
No way... so many letters?
And emails, fan art, unofficial figures too...!?

name: Korpokkur
text:
It was worth it to directly negotiate
with the production team through Nakano Academy and Entertainers.

name: Korpokkur
text:
The plan was approved. Now, all we have to do is wait for the broadcast,
and welcome the children to this amusement park.

name: Korpokkur
text:
So... Snegurochka.
You have nothing to worry about anymore.

name: Korpokkur
text:
And, I'll apologize to you, too—
Jack Frost, sorry for making you go through all that.

name: Jack Frost
text:
Save those words for when Snowland closes down.
Do you know how creepy is it for you to be so nice to me?

name: Korpokkur
text:
Hah!?
After I went through the trouble to apologize to you...

name: Korpokkur
text:
If you so wish to,
I'll work you to the bone forever, Frosty.

options.text: I want to be with you, Snegurochka.
I want to welcome spring with you, Jack.
So, what do you two think?

text:
Snegurochka looked at Jack Frost.
And, in place of her Brother who seemed reluctant to answer, she began to speak.

name: Snegurochka
text:
I truly believe that my mission is to distribute
happiness to children as Santa's granddaughter.

name: Snegurochka
text:
I also became a magical girl in Tokyo, because it's a wonderful
role where I can give dreams to children. I still believe that.

Adding 'But', Snegurochka looked at
[Player] and the others' faces, one by one.

Friends, who had so much fun at the amusement park.
Companions, who planned the Santa Departure Ceremony together.

And— She looked at the eccentric fairy she had
admired like a sibling since the day they met, and said:

name: Snegurochka
text:
It's the same thing Brother said in the loop.
I... Maybe I became a magical girl, because I wanted to leave a legacy of my existence.

name: Snegurochka
text:
Even if I disappear, my work will remain in this world.
Even if a new season starts, I will remain in everyone's memories.

name: Jack Frost
text:
...I guess that's not a bad thing.
Wanting to leave a memory behind in a limited amount of time, huh.

name: Jack Frost
text:
I see. We were thinking the same thing.
We're really like siblings, aren't we, Goo-chan?

name: Snegurochka
text:
Ehehe, thank you, Brother Jack!
Nice to meet you, you can call me Goo-chan!

name: Jack Frost
text:
I'm never calling you that!
And first, stop calling me 'Brother'.

Snegurochka, the Santa's granddaughter,
who was also a reindeer and could do everything by herself.

Living in a world that was 'normal' for her,
the idea of wishing to survive winter never crossed her mind. But—

name: Snegurochka
text:
Waaah!
I want to be with everyone forever!

She had learned the joy of spending time with her companions.
She had learned the sadness of having to see someone off.

She had seen with her own eyes someone who was furious about their fate.
She realized that it was alright to defy the 'role' she was given.

Jack Frost gently hugged the sobbing
Snegurochka and nodded deeply at her words.

name: Korpokkur
text:
I'm sorry, Snegurochka.
I couldn't save you so many times before.

name: Snegurochka
text:
No... Korpokkur-san, thanks to you not
giving up until today, I could be here with everyone now.

name: Snegurochka
text:
And [Player] and the others—
Thank you for letting me tell you my wish.

name: Snegurochka
text:
I am Magical Girl Snegurochka!
To make someone's dream come true, I want to continue living with everyone from now on—!

options.text: Once more, a toast to the magical girl!
A toast for a happy future for everyone!

name: Jack Frost
text:
Hahhh... For that, I'll have to work a little more, won't I?
The show is being broadcast, but the Snowland events are still ongoing.

name: Tianzun
text:
Honestly, that part of you never changes.
Why don't you stop being so perverse and just smile with everyone?

name: Jack Frost
text:
Your meddlesomeness hasn't changed either, old man.
I'm fine being a perverse, disliked person.

name: Jack Frost
text:
Frosty is the one who's popular with everyone...
Now, let's leave our marks on everyone who visits, Goo-chan.

name: Jack Frost
text:
With the best greetings and shows
that no one will ever forget!

name: Snegurochka
text:
I already know, Brother!
I will distribute dreams to everyone through
the show and the stage, and make them remember me!

name: Snegurochka
text:
From now on, we, the siblings,
can always meet here in Tokyo--

Holy Night Transformation!?
Magical Snowland
Continue to Epilogue—
